title: Edward Murdrack, the two-faced man.
subtitle: Was he a 19th-century Englishman named Edward Murducky, born with a "second face" on the back of his head?
author: David Emery
vclaim: A 19th-century British man named Edward Murdrack (also spells "Mordick") was born with a rare medical condition in the form of an extra face on the back of his head.
